original_text: And he must bring a basket of bread that people have made without yeast. He must bring cakes that people have made with the best flour and oil. Also, he must bring thin biscuits with oil on them. But they must not have yeast in them either. He must bring the proper grain offerings and drink offerings with them.
korean_text: 무교병 한 광주리와 고운 가루에 기름 섞은 과자들과 기름 바른 무교전병들과 그 소제물과 전제물을 드릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: And he must bring a basket of bread
that people have made without yeast
that people have made with the best flour and oil
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 최고의 밀가루와 기름으로 만든 과자

sentences.original_text: Also, he must bring thin biscuits with oil on them
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 그는 기름을 바른 얇은 비스킷을 가져와야 합니다

sentences.original_text: But they must not have yeast in them either
He must bring the proper grain offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 적절한 곡물 예물을 가져와야 합니다
그리고 그것들과 함께 음료 예물도 가져와야 합니다
